title: OrgFensakConfig
description: The configuration for Fensak pertaining to your GitHub Organization.

repos.description: The mapping of repo names (scoped to the org) to the corresponding repository configuration.

^.*$.description: The configuration for a specific repository.

ruleFile.description: The path (relative to the repo root) to the file to use for the rules source.

ruleLang.description: The language that the rules source is written in. If omitted, the language is derived from the source file extension. Note that we will always assume ES6 for js files.
